comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: 350 Lafayette Street (between Bond and Bleecker), opened March 1914. Photo taken from east side of Lafayette Street between Bleecker Street and Jones Alley, looking north. NY Times article from March 15 of that year about the new hospital (PDF format) current Google Street View
